price: 41 non l’œuvre d’un poète - mais vous êtes si peu disposés à croire -
arabic: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوۡلِ شَاعِرٖۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wamā huwa biqawli shāʿirin qalīlan mā tu'minūna
